div:
Introduction AIM Annotation PolyGon extension resource This extension defines a polygon line annotation to an image It contains the following fields opacity - this is the optical opacity of the line. What are its units and range??? color- this is the color of the line. What are its units and range??? style - this is the style of the line. What are its units and range??? thickness- this is the thicknedd of the line. What are its units and range??? coordinates- A series of points, each of which is an x,y point of the polygonal line. Each point is a string of the format \"{d},{d}\" where d is a fhir decimal string, and each point is seperated from the next by a space.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of how and where this resource is referenced.
Review Status
NotReviewed
